thread.title: Turkey-US relations hit all time low over Syria

title: Turkey-US relations hit all time low over Syria
text:
Turkey-US relations hit all time low over Syria 11:51am GMT - 02:23 
U.S. officials say that Secretary of State Rex Tillerson expects to have difficult conversations during a visit to Turkey on Thursday and Friday, given that the NATO allies have starkly diverging interests in Syria. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. officials say that Secretary of State Rex Tillerson expects to have difficult conversations during a visit to Turkey on Thursday and Friday, given that the NATO allies have starkly diverging interests in Syria.
